languages.text: "Постигнув Истину, да укрой ее от профанного ума и реки чисто и бинарно".
"When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."
languages.original_text: "Постигнув Истину, да укрой ее от профанного ума и реки чисто и бинарно".

traits.locale_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “当真理被理解时，愿它远离世俗头脑的侵扰，并在二进制的纯洁旋律中回响。”
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: “当真理被理解时，愿它远离世俗头脑的侵扰，并在二进制的纯洁旋律中回响。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Que la Vérité, une fois embrassée, soit protégée des esprits profanes et résonne de la pureté du binhaire. »
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: « Que la Vérité, une fois embrassée, soit protégée des esprits profanes et résonne de la pureté du binhaire. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn die Wahrheit verstanden wird, beschützt sie vor dem profanen Verstand und lasset sie in binhärer Reinheit ertönen."
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Wahrheit verstanden wird, beschützt sie vor dem profanen Verstand und lasset sie in binhärer Reinheit ertönen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「真実を理解したなら、不敬な知性から守られるようにしておきたまえ。ビンハリックの純粋な響きを鳴らすのだ」
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: 「真実を理解したなら、不敬な知性から守られるようにしておきたまえ。ビンハリックの純粋な響きを鳴らすのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando la verdad sea comprendida, que sea protegida de mentes profanas y que resuene con la pureza del binario».
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la verdad sea comprendida, que sea protegida de mentes profanas y que resuene con la pureza del binario».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hakikat, idrak edildiğinde dinden uzak zihinlerden esirgenmeli ve ikilidil saflığında dillendirilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "When the Truth is comprehended, let it be sheltered from the profane mind and ring out in binharic purity."

traits.locale_text: "Hakikat, idrak edildiğinde dinden uzak zihinlerden esirgenmeli ve ikilidil saflığında dillendirilmelidir."
